attr.title: The Last Space Fighter
attr.desc: Originally inspired by the «Defenders of the weeping Quasar» of Ian MacLarty, this game has evolved into its own destiny. For the moment, only two levels are available ... But will you be able to defend the planet Earth until the very end? Remember, you are humanity's last hope! ...
attr.inst: Download from itch.io https://yuiio.itch.io/the-last-space-fighter and copy the space_fighter.pyxapp into the spacefighter folder.
attr.inst_md: Download from [itch.io](https://yuiio.itch.io/the-last-space-fighter) and copy the space_fighter.pyxapp into the spacefighter folder.
